## Multiple Dispatch

``` {julia}
function multiply(a,b)
    return a*b
end
```

``` {julia}
@code_llvm multiply(1,1)
```

``` {julia}
@code_llvm multiply(1., 1.)
```

## Avoid allocation

``` {julia}
@code_llvm multiply([1.], [1.])
```

### Mutated function

``` {julia}
function multiply!(s, a,b, i)
    s[i] = a[i] * b[i]
    return s
end
```


``` {julia}
s = zeros(1)
a = [1.]
b = [1.];

@btime multiply(a[1], b[1])
@btime multiply!(s, a, b, 1)
```

## Vandermonde Matrics

``` {julia}
function vander{T}(x::AbstractVector{T}, n=length(x))
  m = length(x)
  V = Array(T,M,n)
  for j = 1:m
    V[j,1] = one(x[j])
  end
  for i = 2:n
    for j = 1:m
      V[j,i] = x[j] * V[j,i-1]
    end
    return V
  end
end
```

``` {julia}
x = [1, 2, 3]
vander(x)
```
